gemini_notes: The video is a demonstration of an incision and drainage procedure on a surgical model. As such, it focuses on the core mechanical steps of the procedure. Pre-procedural steps like patient prep, anesthesia, and post-procedural steps like irrigation, packing, and dressing are not shown.

detected_events.observation: A surgeon uses forceps to tent the skin and makes a linear incision with a scalpel into the simulated abscess.
A hemostat is inserted into the incision and spread open to break up internal loculations within the abscess cavity.
Simulated purulent material is expressed from the incision using the hemostat and manual pressure on the surrounding tissue.
